text: The 1993–94 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 1993–94 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by coach Ralph Willard and future NBA player Chris Robinson.Basketball Reference – Chris Robinson, retrieved 1 May 2020 The team won the Sun Belt Conference Championship and were Sun Belt Basketball Tournament runners-up. They received an at-large bid to the 1994 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament.2016-17 SBC Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 Robinson made the All-Conference and SBC Tournament team.2019-2020 WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 ==Schedule== 1993-94 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 30 April 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 1994 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 1994 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Category:1993 in sports in Kentucky Category:1994 in sports in Kentucky
title: 1993–94 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball team
